unidue.ub.statistics.alephConnector

Class NRequestsGetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • unidue.ub.statistics.alephConnector.NRequestsGetter

  • public class NRequestsGetter
extends java.lang.Object
    Retrieves the number of requests from the Aleph database.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Eike Spielberg

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NRequestsGetter(AlephConnection connection)
      uses a given connection to Aleph database to build an instance of the NRequestsGetter-object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<NRequests> getAllNRequests()
      retrieves all requests
      java.util.List<NRequests> getNRequests(java.lang.String notations)
      retrieves the number of Requests for the documents with an arbitrary notations string
      java.util.List<NRequests> getNRequestsForNotation(java.lang.String notation)
      retrieves the number of Requests for the documents with the defined notations
      java.util.List<NRequests> getNRequestsForRange(java.lang.String notations)
      retrieves the number of Requests for the documents in the region defined by the notations
